title: Tom Kha Gai
directions: Warm the oil in a soup pot over medium heat. Add the curry paste, stirring until fragrant. Add the chicken stock, coconut milk, lemongrass, ginger, chilies, lime juice, and fish sauce and bring it to a simmer, about 5 minutes. Add the chicken strips and simmer for 15 minutes. Add the mushrooms and the 1/4 cup basil and simmer for another 5 minutes. Add salt to taste if needed. Remove the lemongrass and ginger and serve immediately, garnished with fresh basil leaves or cilantro.
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoon Thai red curry paste can also be found in Asian markets
1 large lemongrass stalk trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
6 thin slices fresh galangal or ginger
2 Thai chilies seeded cut in thin slices (use less if you prefer it less spicy)
1 lb chicken breast cut into thin strips
1 cup white button mushrooms sliced thinly
1/4 cup fresh basil leaves preferably Thai basil if you have it, thinly sliced
Cilantro or basil leaves for garnishing
